items.title: Simplify Your Problems: The Psychology of Choice
items.headline: A simple problem solving model to improve critical thinking, organization, productivity, management and creative skills.
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn how to identify a problem, develop and compare solutions, execute a plan and assess the extent to which the problem was solved.
By the end of the course you will know how to develop a concept map and use a fishbone diagram.
During the course you will be able to demonstrate understanding of how to trace a problem to the root cause.
